Note: Can have multiple constructors for same class, but each constructor must take different types of parameters. Types must be unique
Arguments and parameters mean the same thing
No return type for constructor because return type is object of class rectangle, so not necessary to specify this
Also can be used to ensure that when someone else creates one of our classes, they have to provide valid data before they can instantiate it
Constructors have the same name as the class. Typically used to initialize or preset any data that needs to be created in a class
